classmethod cube(generator: czone.generator.generator.Generator, natoms: int = 1000)¶
classmethod cuboctohedron(generator: czone.generator.generator.Generator, natoms: int = 1000)¶
get_construction()¶

for single crystals, base particles -provide generator -get primitive structure as Atoms object -use wulffpack constructors -convert facets to CZ planes-> place w.r.t. generator origin and orientation -return volume with original generator attached
